message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly beneficial for you. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price.  While $1,100,000 is a significant sum, the true value of this product, in terms of the benefits it can bring you, is far greater. I'm willing to come down to $1,225,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,150,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
